content: switch to mc k one row of 1x1 ribbing starting with a knit stitch repeat 4x for 5 row total this should measure 1 from cast on edge switch to longer circular needle and k 1 round set up round *k 32 st pm* repeat * * 2 times for 3 salt repeats in total go to color work chart on page 4 work the chart in k stitch throughout after completing color work chart remove all except bor m 1 marker left k 2 rounds switch to shorter cable needles k one row of 1x1 ribbing starting with a knit stitch repeat 4x for 5 row total switch to contrast color bind off loosely in pattern if you wish a longtail tubular bindoff creates a neat stretchy edge weave in ends soak and block 3 copyright &knits 2026 ********** 4 copyright &knits 2026
